verse.name: v1
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I am covered over with the robe of righteousness That Jesus gives to me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v2
verse.lines: {lang-eng}I am covered over with the righteous blood of Jesus and He lives in me.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v3
verse.lines: {lang-eng}What a joy to know the heavenly Father loves me so, and gives to me, my Jesus.{/lang-eng}

verse.name: v4
verse.lines: {lang-eng}When He looks at me He sees not what I used to be, but He sees Jesus.{/lang-eng}
